column1: The  Petitioners  contend  that  in  view  to  provide  their  good  service  and  to  manage  the
Society in a transparent and productive manner, the said Society had drafted a Constitution
to  govern  the  administration of  the  Society. The  said  Constitution is  marked  as  P7.  It  is
submitted that as per the Constitution, the Society should call an Annual General Meeting
every two years and elect members to the committee of the said Society.
